name: contentmagic
description: AI-powered social media content management platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test:run --prefix frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.install:all: npm ci && npm ci --prefix backend && npm ci --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
